lead_paragraph: The move by Kent’s selectmen prompted Gov. Dannel P. Malloy to say he would be “frightened and disappointed” if any town adopted the firearms training program.

headline.print_headline: Town Considers Firearms Training  for Schoolteachers
headline.main: Kent, Conn., Looks at Training Teachers to Use Guns

snippet: The move by Kent’s selectmen prompted Gov. Dannel P. Malloy to say he would be “frightened and disappointed” if any town adopted the firearms training program.
abstract: Town of Kent, Conn, is considering implementation of program that will train teachers to use firearms in case of school shooting; Gov Dannel P Malloy has voiced his staunch disagreement with proposal.
